Symbol.Script_1D:
dim stElevTypes[3] stElevTypes[1] = `Сверху` stElevTypes[2] = `Сбоку` stElevTypes[3] = `Спереди` if iSymbolType = 3 then stElevTypes[3] = `Сзади` endif
dim stSymbolTypes[3] stSymbolTypes[1] = `Стиль 1` stSymbolTypes[2] = `Стиль 2` stSymbolTypes[3] = `Стиль 3`
Symbol.Script_VL:
call "FM_types" parameters all
if gs_cont_pen = 0 then gs_cont_pen = 1 parameters gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Elevation types ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
values "elevtyp" stElevTypes values "iElevTyp" 1, 2, 3
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "elevtyp" then iElevTyp = 1 if elevtyp = stElevTypes[2] then iElevTyp = 2 if elevtyp = stElevTypes[3] then iElevTyp = 3 parameters iElevTyp = iElevTyp else elevtyp = stElevTypes[1] if iElevTyp = 2 then elevtyp = stElevTypes[2] if iElevTyp = 3 then elevtyp = stElevTypes[3] parameters elevtyp = elevtyp endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Symbol types ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
values "stSymbolType" stSymbolTypes values "iSymbolType" 1, 2, 3
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "stSymbolType" then iSymbolType = 1 if stSymbolType = stSymbolTypes[2] then iSymbolType = 2 if stSymbolType = stSymbolTypes[3] then iSymbolType = 3 parameters iSymbolType = iSymbolType else stSymbolType = stSymbolTypes[1] if iSymbolType = 2 then stSymbolType = stSymbolTypes[2] if iSymbolType = 3 then stSymbolType = stSymbolTypes[3] parameters stSymbolType = stSymbolType endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Deafault sizes ! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- if iSymbolType <> 3 then pl = 0 hideparameter "pl" endif
if iElevtyp = 1 then a = defaultSizes[iSymbolType][1] b = defaultSizes[iSymbolType][2] endif
if iElevtyp = 2 then a = defaultSizes[iSymbolType][1] b = defaultSizes[iSymbolType][3 + pl] endif
if iElevtyp = 3 then a = defaultSizes[iSymbolType][2] b = defaultSizes[iSymbolType][3 + pl] endif
parameters a = a, b = b
lock "a", "b"
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! UI ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
values "gs_ui_current_page" 1
Symbol.Script_UI:
ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page
TABID_ROOT = -1 TABID_STYLES = 1
if TABID_STYLES > 0 then ui_page TABID_STYLES, TABID_ROOT, `Стиль Грузового Автомобиля`, "uiTab_Style_flat(1)" gosub "stylesPage" endif
! ============================================================================= end ! =============================================================================
"stylesPage": pageStartY = 5
ui_infield{3} "iSymbolType", 0, pageStartY + 3, 444, 250, 1, 1, 3, 1, 132, 162, 128, 128, 1, stSymbolTypes[1], 1, 2, stSymbolTypes[2], 2, 3, stSymbolTypes[3], 3 return
